text: Yaqeenan hum aap say pehlay bhi boht say rasool bhej chukay hain jinn mein say baaz kay (waqeyaat) hum aap ko biyan ker chukay hain aur unn mein say baaz kay (qissay) to hum ney aap ko biyan hi nahi kiyey aur kissi rasool ka yeh (maqdoor) na tha kay koi mojzza Allah ki ijazat kay baghair la sakay phir jiss waqt Allah ka hukum aaye ga haq kay sath faisla ker diya jayega aur uss jagah ahl-e-baatil khasaray mein reh jayen gay
